00123   void testScrollingPanelGoDown(){
00124     this->m_caption->setLogicalHeight(40);
00125     this->m_caption->setPhysicalHeight(20);
00126     int y=8;
00127     this->m_caption->setYOffset(y);
00128     this->m_caption->goDown();
